flavorText: One part unstoppable force, one part immovable object.

foreignData.flavorText: Teils unaufhaltsame Kraft, teils unbewegliches Objekt.
foreignData.name: Nachtstahljuggernaut
foreignData.text:
Stärke und Widerstandskraft des Nachtstahljuggernauten sind gleich der Anzahl der Artefakte, die du kontrollierst.
Der Nachtstahljuggernaut ist unzerstörbar und greift in jedem Zug an, falls möglich.

foreignData.flavorText: Mitad fuerza imparable, mitad objeto inamovible.
foreignData.name: Destructor de acero oscuro
foreignData.text:
La fuerza y resistencia del Destructor de acero oscuro son iguales al número de artefactos que controlas.
El Destructor de acero oscuro es indestructible y ataca cada turno si puede.

foreignData.flavorText: À la fois force invincible et objet inébranlable.
foreignData.name: Djaggernaut de sombracier
foreignData.text:
La force et l'endurance du Djaggernaut de sombracier sont chacune égales au nombre d'artefacts que vous contrôlez.
Le Djaggernaut de sombracier est indestructible et il attaque à chaque tour si possible.

foreignData.flavorText: Una parte forza inarrestabile, una parte oggetto inamovibile.
foreignData.name: Juggernaut di Darksteel
foreignData.text:
La forza e la costituzione del Juggernaut di Darksteel sono pari al numero di artefatti che controlli.
Il Juggernaut di Darksteel è indistruttibile e attacca ogni turno, se può farlo.

foreignData.flavorText: 止められない力であり、動かざる物体でもある。
foreignData.name: ダークスティールの巨大戦車
foreignData.text:
ダークスティールの巨大戦車のパワーとタフネスは、それぞれあなたがコントロールするアーティファクトの総数に等しい。
ダークスティールの巨大戦車はは破壊されず、可能なら毎ターン攻撃する。
foreignData.type: アーティファクト・クリーチャー — 巨大戦車

foreignData.flavorText: De uma parte, força incontrolável, de outra, objeto imóvel.
foreignData.name: Juggernaut de Aço Negro
foreignData.text:
O poder e a resistência de Juggernaut de Aço Negro são ambos iguais ao número de artefatos que você controla.
Juggernaut de Aço Negro é indestrutível e ataca a cada turno se estiver apto.

foreignData.flavorText: Отчасти неудержимая сила, отчасти незыблемая громадина.
foreignData.name: Джаггернаут Темной Стали
foreignData.text:
Сила и выносливость Джаггернаута Темной Стали равны количеству артефактов под вашим контролем.
Джаггернаут Темной Стали не может быть уничтожен и атакует в каждом ходу, если может.

foreignData.flavorText: 一部分是无法抵挡的力量，一部份则是无法撼动的物体。
foreignData.name: 玄铁攻城巨车
foreignData.text:
玄铁攻城巨车的力量与防御力各等同于由你操控的神器之数量。
玄铁攻城巨车不会毁坏，且每回合若能攻击，则必须攻击。

foreignData.flavorText: 一部分是無法抵擋的力量，一部份則是無法撼動的物體。
foreignData.name: 玄鐵攻城巨車
foreignData.text:
玄鐵攻城巨車的力量與防禦力各等同於由你操控的神器之數量。
玄鐵攻城巨車不會毀壞，且每回合若能攻擊，則必須攻擊。

name: Darksteel Juggernaut
originalText:
Darksteel Juggernaut's power and toughness are each equal to the number of artifacts you control.
Darksteel Juggernaut is indestructible and attacks each turn if able.

rulings.text: Since Darksteel Juggernaut is itself an artifact, its power and toughness will always be at least 1 while it's on the battlefield (unless a spell or ability somehow changes its card type).

Lethal damage and effects that say “destroy” won't cause Darksteel Juggernaut to be put into the graveyard. However, it can be put into the graveyard for a number of other reasons. The most likely reasons are if its toughness is 0 or less or it's sacrificed.

If, during your declare attackers step, Darksteel Juggernaut is tapped, is affected by a spell or ability that says it can't attack, or is affected by “summoning sickness,” then it doesn't attack. If there's a cost associated with having Darksteel Juggernaut attack, you aren't forced to pay that cost, so it doesn't have to attack in that case either.
The first ability works in all zones.

text:
Indestructible
Darksteel Juggernaut's power and toughness are each equal to the number of artifacts you control.
Darksteel Juggernaut attacks each combat if able.
